subject: World Cup 2010 (Soccer)
Soccer
Advertising and Marketing
lead_paragraph: Less than two weeks after surgery on his right arm, Ivory Coast striker Didier Drogba played the final 24 minutes of the Elephants’ scoreless tie against Portugal.
snippet: Less than two weeks after surgery on his right arm, Ivory Coast striker Didier Drogba played the final 24 minutes of the Elephants’ scoreless tie against Portugal.
